text: newspaper advert Charge It is a 1921 American silent drama film directed by Harry Garson and starring Clara Kimball Young.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:..Charge It ==Cast== *Clara Kimball Young - Julia Lawrence *Herbert Rawlinson - Philip Lawrence *Edward M. Kimball - Tom Garreth *Betty Blythe - Mille Garreth *Nigel Barrie - Dana Herrick *Hal Wilson - Robert McGregor *Dulcie Cooper - Rose McGregor ==Preservation status== *A copy is preserved in the UCLA Film and Television Archive. Clara Kimball Young Website: by Greta deGroat The Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:.. title: Charge It
